name: Kinky Demo
description:
Shoulder bash your way through two complete stages in this Warioland inspired  top down game. Bash enemies into each other, or pick them up after staggering them to use as projectiles. Race against a countdown timer after triggering the exit switch.  The game is Gachimuchi themed because we honestly do not have enough original gachi media.

Features music by Dankmus: https://www.youtube.com/c/Dankmus

Only windows and keyboard controls for now. The framework for the demo (start screen, ending etc.) were hastily built using glue, paperclips and every last drop of my cum. Expect to encounter bugs.

If you enjoyed the demo please join the mailing list for updates about the game: https://mailchi.mp/e001d3519d81/kinky-updates-mailing-list
